00023 #include <l4/re/dataspace>
00024 #include <l4/re/dataspace-sys.h>
00025 #include <l4/re/protocols>
00026 
00027 #include <l4/cxx/exceptions>
00028 #include <l4/cxx/ipc_helper>
00029 #include <l4/cxx/ipc_stream>
00030 
00031 inline
00032 L4::Ipc::Istream &operator >> (L4::Ipc::Istream &s, L4Re::Dataspace::Stats &v)
00033 { s.get(v); return s; }
00034 
00035 namespace L4Re {
00036 
00037 long
00038 Dataspace::__map(unsigned long offset, unsigned char *size, unsigned long flags,
00039                  l4_addr_t local_addr) const throw()
00040 {
00041   l4_addr_t spot = local_addr & ~(~0UL << l4_umword_t(*size));
00042   l4_addr_t base = local_addr & (~0UL << l4_umword_t(*size));
00043   L4::Ipc::Iostream io(l4_utcb());
00044   io << L4::Opcode(Dataspace_::Map) << offset << spot << flags;
00045   io << L4::Ipc::Rcv_fpage::mem(base, *size, 0);
00046   long err = l4_error(io.call(cap(), L4Re::Protocol::Dataspace));
00047   if (err < 0)
00048     return err;
00049 
00050   L4::Ipc::Snd_fpage fp;
00051   io >> fp;
00052   *size = fp.rcv_order();
00053   return err;
00054 }
00055 
00056 long
00057 Dataspace::map_region(l4_addr_t offset, unsigned long flags,
00058                       l4_addr_t min_addr, l4_addr_t max_addr) const throw()
00059 {
00060   min_addr   = l4_trunc_page(min_addr);
00061   max_addr   = l4_round_page(max_addr);
00062   unsigned char order = L4_LOG2_PAGESIZE;
00063 
00064   long err = 0;
00065 
00066   while (min_addr < max_addr)
00067     {
00068       unsigned char order_mapped;
00069       order_mapped = order
00070         = l4_fpage_max_order(order, min_addr, min_addr, max_addr, min_addr);
00071       err = __map(offset, &order_mapped, flags, min_addr);
00072       if (EXPECT_FALSE(err < 0))
00073   return err;
00074 
00075       if (order > order_mapped)
00076   order = order_mapped;
00077 
00078       min_addr += 1UL << order;
00079       offset   += 1UL << order;
00080 
00081       if (min_addr >= max_addr)
00082   return 0;
00083 
00084       while (min_addr != l4_trunc_size(min_addr, order)
00085              || max_addr < l4_round_size(min_addr + 1,order))
00086   --order;
00087     }
00088 
00089   return 0;
00090 }
00091 
00092 
00093 long
00094 Dataspace::map(l4_addr_t offset, unsigned long flags,
00095                l4_addr_t local_addr,
00096                l4_addr_t min_addr, l4_addr_t max_addr) const throw()
00097 {
00098   min_addr   = l4_trunc_page(min_addr);
00099   max_addr   = l4_round_page(max_addr);
00100   local_addr = l4_trunc_page(local_addr);
00101   unsigned char order
00102     = l4_fpage_max_order(L4_LOG2_PAGESIZE, local_addr, min_addr, max_addr, local_addr);
00103 
00104   return __map(offset, &order, flags, local_addr);
00105 }
00106 
00107 long
00108 Dataspace::clear(unsigned long offset, unsigned long size) const throw()
00109 {
00110   L4::Ipc::Iostream io(l4_utcb());
00111   io << L4::Opcode(Dataspace_::Clear) << offset << size;
00112   long err = l4_error(io.call(cap(), L4Re::Protocol::Dataspace));
00113   if (EXPECT_FALSE(err < 0))
00114     return err;
00115 
00116   long sz;
00117   io >> sz;
00118   return sz;
00119 }
00120 
00121 int
00122 Dataspace::info(Stats *stats) const throw()
00123 {
00124   L4::Ipc::Iostream io(l4_utcb());
00125   io << L4::Opcode(Dataspace_::Stats);
00126   long err = l4_error(io.call(cap(), L4Re::Protocol::Dataspace));
00127   if (EXPECT_FALSE(err < 0))
00128     return err;
00129 
00130   io >> *stats;
00131   return 0;
00132 }
00133 
00134 long
00135 Dataspace::size() const throw()
00136 {
00137   Stats stats;
00138   int err = info(&stats);
00139   if (err < 0)
00140     return err;
00141   return stats.size;
00142 }
00143 
00144 long
00145 Dataspace::flags() const throw()
00146 {
00147   Stats stats;
00148   int err = info(&stats);
00149   if (err < 0)
00150     return err;
00151   return stats.flags;
00152 }
00153 
00154 long
00155 Dataspace::copy_in(unsigned long dst_offs, L4::Cap<Dataspace> src,
00156                    unsigned long src_offs, unsigned long size) const throw()
00157 {
00158   L4::Ipc::Iostream io(l4_utcb());
00159   io << L4::Opcode(Dataspace_::Copy) << dst_offs << src_offs << size << src;
00160   return l4_error(io.call(cap(), L4Re::Protocol::Dataspace));
00161 }
00162 
00163 long
00164 Dataspace::phys(l4_addr_t offset, l4_addr_t &phys_addr, l4_size_t &phys_size) const throw()
00165 {
00166   L4::Ipc::Iostream io(l4_utcb());
00167   io << L4::Opcode(Dataspace_::Phys) << offset;
00168   long err = l4_error(io.call(cap(), L4Re::Protocol::Dataspace));
00169   if (EXPECT_FALSE(err < 0))
00170     return err;
00171 
00172   io >> phys_addr >> phys_size;
00173   return 0;
00174 }
00175 
00176 long
00177 Dataspace::allocate(l4_addr_t offset, l4_size_t size) throw()
00178 {
00179   L4::Ipc::Iostream io(l4_utcb());
00180   io << L4::Opcode(Dataspace_::Allocate) << offset << size;
00181   return l4_error(io.call(cap(), L4Re::Protocol::Dataspace));
00182 }

00185 long
00186 Dataspace::take() const throw()
00187 {
00188   L4::Ipc::Iostream io(l4_utcb());
00189   io << L4::Opcode(Dataspace_::Take);
00190   return l4_error(io.call(cap(), L4Re::Protocol::Dataspace));
00191 }
00192 
00193 long
00194 Dataspace::release() const throw()
00195 {
00196   L4::Ipc::Iostream io(l4_utcb());
00197   io << L4::Opcode(Dataspace_::Release);
00198   return l4_error(io.call(cap(), L4Re::Protocol::Dataspace));
